entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 12:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or flurries near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
